channel.title: Teleport Command? Help..PLZ
channel.description:
Hey ppl i was wondering if anyone knew how to make a command for teleporting and not for item spawning?????
-Pure Jukes

item.title: Teleport Command? Help..PLZ
item.dc:creator: @jamesbrooks jamesbrooks
item.description:
@jamesbrooks wrote:

[quote=“Pure jukes, post:6, topic:219008”]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”) && (playerRights >= 2) { //admin+ command

i put this after it but when i compiled it sed there was an error[/quote]
Should be

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home") && (playerRights >= 2)) { //admin+ command

Read full topic

item.description:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“adminslair”))
{
sendMessage(“Welcome to the ADMIN’S LAIR!”);
teleportToX = 3295;
teleportToY = 9625;

looks like this… so where do i add the player rights thing??

item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”) && (playerRights >= 2) { //admin+ command
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”) && (playerRights >= 3) { //owner command
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”) && (playerRights >= 1) { //mod+ command

item.title: Teleport Command? Help..PLZ
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“jamesbrooks, post:2, topic:219008”]Well

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = 2871; teleportToY = 2952; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }
Change the name (thats what u type in) and the co-ords x and y[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2008, 11:25:44 AM[/size][hr]I will change it if you want
tell me name and x & y co-ordinates, and then paste in client.JAVA. Search for home in there and put one line, and paste[/quote]That is nested wrong… it should be…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = 2871; teleportToY = 2952; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); } }

Read full topic
